bibl.title: A New Coptic Fragment of 2 Samuel 10:13-14, 17-18: McGill MS NO Coptic 2.
bibl.note: P. Montreal McGill Univ. Inv. MS NO Coptic 2 [formerly von Scherling's collection] belongs to a page of a codex currently housed in the Montserrat Abbey, which was published as P. Monts. Roca II, 4. Coptic biblical fragment reused as magical text. Provenance unknown.
bibl.seg: 140.13 P. Montreal MacGill Univ. Inv. MS NO Coptic 2
Jones Brice C., A New Coptic Fragment of 2 Samuel 10:13-14, 17-18: McGill MS NO Coptic 2.

P. Montreal McGill Univ. Inv. MS NO Coptic 2 [formerly von Scherling's collection] belongs to a page of a codex currently housed in the Montserrat Abbey, which was published as P. Monts. Roca II, 4. Coptic biblical fragment reused as magical text. Provenance unknown.
